name: Slimy Dungeons
description:
Slimy Dungeons is a roguelite game with tones of enemies, bosses, items, achievements and secrets. Uncover the mystery of the Dungeon and fight for your life.

Gameplay:

The game conception is simple. You need to find a key and back to the initial room to end the level. But it may not be that simple. Enemies do everything they can to stop you. You need to beware traps as well. Game is getting harder every level and you must adapt. Fortunately there are items giving you new powers and improving your characteristics. There are also minigames such as lock picking, fighting on arena, finding treasure chests and lots of others.

Briefly about the game:

• 200 unique items that make any run easier or crazier
• 50+ enemies
• 19 bosses
• 53 achievements and rewards
• 14 playable characters with their own features
• 3 difficulty levels providing new challenges, events, locations and enemies
• 4 secret levels
• Random dungeon generation
• Lots of potions, scrolls, spells
